name: Number To 2048
description:
The game screen is very simple, at the beginning mostly gray box, the puzzle appears when the player figures will change color, the overall style is very simple.
Rules of the game is very simple, each can choose one direction to go up and down the slide, each slide once all the numbers are outside the box, the system will place a random number in the blank box appears a figure closer to the sliding direction, the same number of boxes in the close, when the collision will be adding. System gives digital box instead of two is four, players find a way Couchu "2048" figure box.

游戏的画面很简单，一开始方格大部分都是灰色的，当玩家拼图出现数字之后就会改变颜色，整体格调很是简单。
游戏规则很简单，每次可以选择上下左右其中一个方向去滑动，每滑动一次，所有的数字方块都会往滑动的方向靠拢外，系统也会在空白的地方乱数出现一个数字方块，相同数字的方块在靠拢、相撞时会相加。系统给予的数字方块不是2就是4，玩家要想办法凑出“2048”这个数字方块。
